text.tspan: Malnutrition: Prevalence of childhood stunting, male vs. female, 2022
Share of children younger than 5 years, male versus female, that fall below two standard deviations from the
median height-for-age of the WHO Child Growth Standards.
Prevalence of stunting, female (% of children under 5) (% of children under 5)
Prevalence of stunting, male (% of children under 5) (% of children
Data source: Multiple sources compiled by World Bank (2024)
